# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(str::AbstractString; text_width::Int=10)
    lines = []
    for word in split(str, " ")
        if length(word) + 1 > text_width  # Add 1 for the space after the word
            push!(lines, word)
        else
            append!(lines[end], ' ', word)
        end
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

println(wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines"))  # Example output: This function will\nwrap words into\nlines
```
